title: What is the future of work?
description: Is AI going to take away your job?

vocabItems.word: take (something) with a pinch of salt
vocabItems.definition: not completely believe something you are told because you think it’s unlikely to be true
the achievements or failures of someone’s past performance
person who imagines or foresees a dystopian future where there is great suffering and injustice in society
to remove something that you do not want any longer
